project.name: Vega Media 2018

umbral.select_data_param: SELECT IPA1.COD, IPA2.FECHA, [IPA1].[Z]-[IPA2].[PNP] AS CNP, IPA2.SITUACION FROM IPA1 INNER JOIN IPA2 ON IPA1.COD = IPA2.COD WHERE IPA1.COD=? AND IPA2.FECHA>=? AND IPA2.FECHA<=? AND IPA2.SITUACION='D' ORDER BY IPA1.COD, IPA2.FECHA;

SELECT IPA1.COD, IPA2.FECHA, [IPA1].[Z]-[IPA2].[PNP] AS CNP, IPA2.SITUACION FROM IPA1 INNER JOIN IPA2 ON IPA1.COD = IPA2.COD WHERE IPA1.COD=? AND IPA2.FECHA>=? AND IPA2.FECHA<=? AND IPA2.SITUACION<>'D' ORDER BY IPA1.COD, IPA2.FECHA;

project.select_umbral: SELECT IPA1.COD, IPA1.TOPONIMIA, IPA1.X_UTM, IPA1.Y_UTM, IPA1.Z, IPA1_UMBRAL.COD_UMBRAL, IPA1_UMBRAL.PARAMETRO, IPA1_UMBRAL.UMBRAL FROM IPA1 INNER JOIN IPA1_UMBRAL ON IPA1.COD = IPA1_UMBRAL.COD WHERE IPA1.COD=? AND IPA1_UMBRAL.COD_UMBRAL=? AND IPA1_UMBRAL.PARAMETRO=? ORDER BY IPA1.COD;
